verses.name: Ephesians 1:1
verses.text: Paul, an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God, to the saints which are at Ephesus, and to the faithful in Christ Jesus:

verses.name: Ephesians 1:2
verses.text: Grace be to you, and peace, from God our Father, and from the Lord Jesus Christ.

verses.name: Ephesians 1:3
verses.text: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who hath blessed us with all spiritual blessings in heavenly places in Christ:

verses.name: Ephesians 1:4
verses.text: According as he hath chosen us in him before the foundation of the world, that we should be holy and without blame before him in love:
